title: Falling North
description: After their difficult childhood and struggle against impossible odds, nothing could tear apart two brothers—except maybe the woman tasked with saving their dream.Drummer and bandleader Xander Silva spent his life sacrificing for his younger brother Matty. But who will save him when the pressure of a failing career pushes him toward the one woman he can’t have?Marketing queen Lydia Carmichael gets the assignment of a lifetime: Save a fledgling rock band from becoming a mega bust for their mega label. Sparks fly when she lays eyes on Xander and senses her client’s mutual attraction. But they have to resist for the sake of their careers—and the heart of his love-struck brother.With everything on the line, forbidden passion burns hot on a high stakes East Coast tour. Will their hopeless situation destroy their careers before they’ve begun? Or can the strength of brotherly love change destinies?FALLING NORTH is an unrequited love triangle, slow burn, rockstar romance and can be read as a standalone.
author: Alyson Santos
